create.alreadyRegistered: You already have a registered wallet. Click the login button below to log in.
create.error: Error during registration, please try again

btn.create: Use biometrics to prove you're not a robot

sso.description:
Before continuing, please make sure you are using a device that belongs to you.
Frak is a solution allowing {{productName}} to reward its community for the help provided in promoting its offers. Frak is a decentralized and open-source solution, which does not store any personal or biometric data.
To learn more about {{productName}}, please review our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.
sso.subTitle: to immediately receive your winnings from <pLink>{{productName}}</pLink>.
sso.title: Create your wallet

default.description: Connect to your Frak account to get the best experience on this platform.
default.title: Connection

default.description:
Start a rewarding session to earn as you interact anonymously on this site. Enjoy benefits without sharing personal details. 
Learn more in our privacy policy.
default.title: Activation

default.description: To complete, authorize this transaction in your wallet. This ensures secure processing.
default.title: Transaction

default.description: Please authenticate with your wallet to proceed securely. Your signature confirms your identity.
default.title: Authentication
